name: Summon Flight of Eagles
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Adventurer's Guide © 2017, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, F (a gold feather worth 100 gp)
text: You summon 1d4+1 giant eagles to serve as you designate. The summoned birds can fight if you wish, but can also serve as mounts.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（一片价值100gp的金羽）
text_zh: 你召唤1d4+1只巨鹰来按照你的指派效力。召唤的鸟类可以入你的意愿战斗，但是也可以用作坐骑。
